name: Prootein - A Root Wrestling Game
description:
TIME TO ROOT!

Challenge your friends in this fast paced root wrestling!

For 2 players with only one mobile phone, the winner is the one who clicks the fastest. fuck IOS!

be either: A angry carot with father issues.

or: A angry pumpkin with father issues.

And also in the game there is a neat scarecrow, the coolest character of the game!

TEAM: 

Programation: Jules Morquin (Yukai), Emanuele Cirronis 

2D Art: Julien Ramiere (Jujuxtaposey), Roussin Mickael (TheSnowly)

Animation: Kilian Le quellec (cmweeee)

Game Design, UI: Yohan Giordano (AydenYG)

Music, Sound Design: Roussin Mickael (TheSnowly)
